name: Verify User can reach Installed apps page from app container via UI
description:
### Pre-conditions:
- Shell app installed.

### Steps:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Click `Show All` button on Shell App container.

### Verify that:

- Shell app displayed in Installed Apps.
